page.title: 08HEALTH-BIRTH AT MUSGROVE
page.content: The smallest baby born at Taunton's Musgrove Park Hospital left for home on Monday .....weighing just 3\lb. Emma Woodley weighed a mere 1lb 5oz when she was born to a former Wellington woman 11 weeks ago. Emma was born ten weeks prematurely,delivered by Caesarian section,after 29-year-old Mrs. Judith Woodley was taken to hospital with high blood pressure. Initially there were complications,and the baby received antibiotics to combat two serious infections.She was kept in an incubator until last weekend.
